scripts.build: tsc && vite build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const v=require('./package.json').version+'.'+Date.now();const sw=fs.readFileSync('dist/sw.js','utf8').replace('__SW_VERSION__',v);fs.writeFileSync('dist/sw.js',sw);console.log('SW version:',v)" && cd dist && rm -f nedagram-offline*.zip && zip -r nedagram-offline-$(node -p "require('../package.json').version").zip . -x '*.map' -x 'nedagram-offline*.zip' -x 'icons/og-image.jpg' -x 'icons/logo.png' -x 'icons/icon-192.png' -x 'icons/icon-512.png' -x 'CNAME' -x 'manifest.json' && cp nedagram-offline-$(node -p "require('../package.json').version").zip nedagram-offline.zip
